required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SHARE Study 4: Financial Incentives for Weight Loss
clinical_study.official_title: Using a State-wide Initiative to Disseminate Effective Behavioral Weight Loss Strategies: Study 4

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine different types of monetary incentive paradigms for weight loss.

primary_outcome.measure: weight change from initial assessment to the 3-month follow-up assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram

secondary_outcome.measure: weight change from the initial assessment to the 12 month assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram
Weight change from the 3 month assessment to the 12 month assessment measured on a digital scale to the nearest 0.1-kilogram

arm_group.arm_group_label: Online weight loss + Incentives for behavior 3 months
Online weight loss + Incentives for weight loss 3 months
Online weight loss + Incentives for behavior 12 months
Online weight loss + Incentives for weight loss 12 months

intervention.intervention_name: Online weight loss + incentives for behavior 3 months
intervention.description: Participants will receive monetary incentives for submitting their behavior change information into a study website
intervention.arm_group_label: Online weight loss + Incentives for behavior 3 months

intervention.intervention_name: Online weight loss + incentives for weight loss at month 3
intervention.description: Participants will receive an incentive for meeting their weight loss goal at month 3.
intervention.arm_group_label: Online weight loss + Incentives for weight loss 3 months

intervention.intervention_name: Online weight loss + Incentives for behavior 12 months
intervention.description: Participants will receive incentives for submitting behavior change information over the course of 12 months.
intervention.arm_group_label: Online weight loss + Incentives for behavior 12 months

intervention.intervention_name: Online weight loss + Incentives for weight loss 12 months
intervention.description: Participants will be receive monetary incentives for reaching their weight loss goal at months 3 and 12.
intervention.arm_group_label: Online weight loss + Incentives for weight loss 12 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI >=25kg/m2
- English speaking
- Age 18-70
Exclusion Criteria:
- Health problems that make weight loss or unsupervised exercise unsafe
- Current pregnancy or plan to become pregnant int he next 12 months
- Planned relocation
- Current participation in weight loss research study

facility.name: The Miriam Hospital's Weight Control and Diabetes Research Center
